{"id":848509572,"question_id":415,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1669195197,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/848509572/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"44 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String addStrings(String num1, String num2) {\n        \n        \n        int l1= num1.length();\n        int l2 = num2.length();\n        int i1 = l1-1;\n        int i2 = l2-1;\n        \n        int carry=0;\n        \n        StringBuilder sb= new StringBuilder();\n        while(i1>=0 || i2>=0){\n            \n            int sum = carry;\n            if(i1>=0){\n                sum += num1.charAt(i1)-'0';\n                i1--;\n            }\n            \n            if(i2>=0){\n                sum += num2.charAt(i2)-'0';\n                i2--;\n            }\n            // System.out.println(sum);\n            \n            carry = sum/10;\n            sb.insert(0 , sum%10);            \n        }\n        \n        if(carry>0){\n            sb.insert(0, carry);\n        }\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
